title: Java Spelling Corrector
text:
An automatic spelling corrector.
It is used to check and correct spelling errors in pieces of text read from text file.

title: Java RPN Calculator

title: Vue.js Todo-list-app
text:
My first project with usage of vue.js.
Basic ToDo application where you can add, remove, edit and cross out completed tasks.
